table.name: equipment_group_compartment
table.description: This table stores the details about the individual portions within the equipment group. An equipment group may have one or more compartments. This table records the size (length, width, height), weight and volume information about each compartment. A link to temperature control for each compartment can also be made.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_GROUP_GID
columns.description: The GID for the equipment group.

columns.name: COMPARTMENT_NUM
columns.description: Identifies the compartment by number.

columns.name: MAX_WEIGHT
columns.description: The maximum weight for the equipment group compartment.

columns.name: MAX_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the maximum weight.

columns.name: MAX_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The maximum weight for the equipment group compartment in base units.

columns.name: MAX_VOLUME
columns.description: The maximum capacity for the equipment group compartment.

columns.name: MAX_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the max volume.

columns.name: MAX_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The maximum capacity for the equipment group compartment in base units.

columns.name: MAX_METRIC3
columns.description: N/A

columns.name: MAX_METRIC4
columns.description: N/A

columns.name: LENGTH
columns.description: The length of the equipment group compartment.

columns.name: LENGTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for LENGTH column.

columns.name: LENGTH_BASE
columns.description: Length in base units.

columns.name: WIDTH
columns.description: The width of the equipment group compartment.

columns.name: WIDTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the width column.

columns.name: WIDTH_BASE
columns.description: The width in base units.

columns.name: HEIGHT
columns.description: The height of the equipment group compartment.

columns.name: HEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for HEIGHT column.

columns.name: HEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The height in base units.

columns.name: TEMPERATURE_CONTROL_GID
columns.description: The GID to define the temperature controls value for the commodity.

columns.name: ALLOW_COMMODITY_MIXING
columns.description: Specifies if different commodity items can be shipped in the same compartment in an equipment group. Valid values are Y for yes and N for no.

columns.name: DOOR_HEIGHT
columns.description: Defines the height of the door for the compartment.

columns.name: DOOR_HEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The door height unit of measure.

columns.name: DOOR_HEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The door height in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: CURVE_GID
columns.description: The curve function for the roof of the compartment.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: START_LENGTH_POSITION
columns.description: Defines the starting position for the compartment length wise.

columns.name: START_LENGTH_POSITION_BASE
columns.description: The start length position in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: START_LENGTH_POSITION_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The start length position unit of measure.

columns.name: START_WIDTH_POSITION
columns.description: Defines the starting position for the compartment, width wise.

columns.name: START_WIDTH_POSITION_BASE
columns.description: The start width position in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: START_WIDTH_POSITION_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The start width position unit of measure.

columns.name: START_HEIGHT_POSITION
columns.description: Defines the starting position for the compartment, height wise.

columns.name: START_HEIGHT_POSITION_BASE
columns.description: The start height position in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: START_HEIGHT_POSITION_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The start height position unit of measure.

columns.name: COMPARTMENT_TYPE_GID
columns.description: A GID to define the compartment type.

columns.name: HAS_METER
columns.description: Indicates if the compartment has METER or not (The METER is a device that is used the measure how much product is discharged at any given stop).

columns.name: COMMODITY_GID
columns.description: Commodity that is compatible with the compartment.

columns.name: IS_BULK
columns.description: Indicates if it is a BULK. If Y then BULK If N then PACKAGED.

columns.name: WIDTH_OFFSET
columns.description: Offset by which the compartment needs to be shifted widthwise to get the OUT OF GAUGE envelope.

columns.name: WIDTH_OFFSET_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The width offset unit of measure.

columns.name: WIDTH_OFFSET_BASE
columns.description: The width offset in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: LENGTH_FWD_OFFSET
columns.description: Offset by which the compartment needs to be shifted FORWARD lengthwise to get the OUT OF GAUGE envelope.

columns.name: LENGTH_FWD_OFFSET_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The length forward offset unit of measure.

columns.name: LENGTH_FWD_OFFSET_BASE
columns.description: The length forward offset in the base unit of measure.
